name: Incineration
description: When casting a Fire Spell, create a 3x3 area centered on a space of your choice within 4 spaces for 2 turns. When a Unit starts their turn on one of those squares, they take ½ your Mag - the target’s Res. Fire Wall Variant: Fire Wall deals damage when a Unit ends their turn adjacent to the Fire Wall square instead of Incineration’s normal effect. A Unit can only take one instance of Fire Wall damage per turn.
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
